title: Trump’s tariff formula used the wrong value in its calculations, conservative think tank says. ‘This whole thing was rigged.’
description: "What's driving the policy, is that since the 1980s Trump has been a protectionist, and he thinks trade deficits are losses and trade surpluses are profits," AEI's Stan Veuger told Fortune.
author: Paolo Confino
excerpt: A report from the American Enterprise Institute showed the White House used the wrong number in its tariff calculations.
text: Trump’s tariff formula used the wrong value in its calculations, conservative think tank says. ‘This whole thing was rigged.’President Donald Trump holds up a report authored by the U.S. Trade Representative's office that he cited as instrumental in his tariff policy, which was announced during a ceremony in the Rose Garden last week. Kent Nishimura/Bloomberg
html:
Trump’s tariff formula used the wrong value in its calculations, conservative think tank says. ‘This whole thing was rigged.’

President Donald Trump holds up a report authored by the U.S. Trade Representative's office that he cited as instrumental in his tariff policy, which was announced during a ceremony in the Rose Garden last week.

Kent Nishimura/Bloomberg
